Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Theresa S
Reviews.Content: I bought this to relpace an older, 6 mp camera, and it is great.  picture clarity is awesome, battery life seems to be very good, and it is EASY to use.  The camera has more optical zoom than I have ever seen on a camera its size, and a great macro setting.  I can get clear and defined product images very up close an personal.  I can also get great pictures of my kids, and it is so easy that i can pass the camera off and anyone can click and shoot a great picture.The camera also has HD video recording, and it is great.  I have been needing to make some videos for my small business, and this will work nicely.  It will also be great to catch family events on, including when my children meet their new sibling within the next few days.the only thing I would make special note of is that the camera does not have as many manual settings as I am used to.  no manual focus, in particulr.  but, since it does so good a job of the auto focus, I haven not found that to be an issue.overall, I highly reccomend this camera to anyone looking for a new personal or easy to use small business camera.

Reviews.Title: A real battery drain - Olympus Stylus 7040
Reviews.Author: Amazon Shopper
Reviews.Content: This is my 6th Olympus camera (4th digital one), so I am quite an Olympus fan. I bought the Stylus 7040 for its compact size, wide angle, and HD video capability. The Stylus 7040 is by far less intuitive than all previous digital cameras I'e owned(FE-280, Camedia C-60, and D-490). I've used it at 4 parties, 1 vacation and 2 business trips in the past 2 months, and I am still struggling with learning the settings. Worst is I am highly disappointed with the poor battery life, even in power save mode - which then becomes a nuisance because it is so slow to come back on.  I even turned it down to 8M and 5M size. On average, I get 20-30 shots per battery charge!  Maybe I should consult a dealer to see if this is normal or the camera is defective.  It takes decent pictures, and wide angle is good for group pictures.

Reviews.Title: You can't beat this value!
Reviews.Author: Rosemary
Reviews.Content: I still can't believe what a great little camera this is, which I purchased for under $100 through Amazon!  You just can't go wrong!  So easy to use; crisp photos, macro is great! So many people have commented on the quality of photos I have taken. I just slip it into my pocket and go! I'm not too crazy about the ib software..some of the print was impossible to read (looks like chicken-scratch to me); and, there were a few other glitches. But, my computer isn't the latest and greatest. I contacted Olympus re: the software and the technician with whom I spoke was very responsive, informed, patient, efficient.  Great service.  For now, I've opted to use an earlier version of the software.  But, you know:  every time I look at this little camera, I smile!  That's your answer...

Reviews.Title: Nice camera but surprisingly fragile
Reviews.Author: Ron R.
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to replace my wife's older Olympus camera that stopped working after a hard drop (understandable).  After playing around with this camera for a little while, I began to understand and like the multiple features.  There are more features available than most folks will use but they aren't in the way of casual use of the camera, meaning, you can do some pretty neat things if you take the time to learn about the features but it works like a simple point and click camera otherwise.With the default settings (simply turning the camera on), it works well with one issue.  It takes the camera 2-3 seconds to focus which makes it difficult to take spontaneous photos and causes posed subjects to become impatient while waiting for the photographer to snap the picture.  This is somewhat alleviated by pressing the shutter button partially (which activates the auto-focus feature) but this isn't as easy as you might expect.  I've attempted to explain/demonstrate/teach three users but they were unable to grasp the concept.  So, this may be an issue for others.Finally, the main reason I'm taking the time to write this review is the fragility of this camera.  As stated above, our old camera stopped working after dropping it.  In that case, it was understandable as the camera dropped ~5 feet and landed on a hard floor.  However, the new camera was bumped by my dog's tail from a height of 2 feet or less and fell off the coffee table onto the rug below.  The camera appeared fine at first glance and it wasn't until last week that we noticed that the display screen had a spider-web crack which caused half of it to become non-viewable.  We attempted to use the camera anyway (Christmas was here) but it eventually spread through the rest of the screen.  Granted, a camera should be handled with care but this seems a bit unusual.  Even the old camera's screen was still fine after a much more severe drop (and several drops throughout its life).So, final verdict - great camera but handle with care.

Reviews.Title: Olympus 7040 digital camera...
Reviews.Author: maccafan "Beatlemaniac/Paul McCartney Fan"
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice camera and it does all that the description claims.  You do need to charge the battery when you first get it and that was the hardest part for me...I'm impatient and I wanted to try it out!  :-  Once the battery was charged, though, the camera works really well and all the menus are easy to understand.  I love the photos I've taken.  The videos are very crisp and clear indoors or out.  There are many settings to choose from and I just recently tried out the panorama option...it's fun!  Overall, I'd heartily recommend this camera to anyone who wants one easy to use but with a lot of options.  The quality of the photos is remarkable and the HD videos are also great.  I am totally enjoying mine!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Fun to Use
Reviews.Author: Paul B. Kiningham
Reviews.Content: Had not purchased a camera for the family since 2004 so the newer features of the camera were really nice. The one we liked and wish we had before was the panoramic mode. It was easy to use and the results were great. My wife and kids were able to pick up the camera and use it easily. Transferring software is good but complicated. Still trying to learn the program. The thinness of the camera is also a plus.

Reviews.Title: Great all round camers
Reviews.Author: M. Gillen
Reviews.Content: I have been purchasing Olympus cameras for years. They are dependable, easy to use, small and make wonderful videos. Why buy an extra camcorder when you can have all in one little camera.

Reviews.Title: Olympus Stylus 7040 14 MP Digital Camera with 7x Wide Angle Dual Image...
Reviews.Author: Clyde
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed this camera, this is a late review. I'm now buying a new camera that has 1080p instead of the 720 that this camera has. I would love to keep this one, but the 1080p is what I wanted in the first place, I just wish I had spent a little more so I wouldn't have to stop using this one.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: John S. Wilson
Reviews.Content: The camera takes very sharp pictures, and very quickly changes from wide angle to telephoto.  Almost too quickly!  I like the size and also the built in instructions.  it also has a few means of addressing photos so that one can be imaginitive.

Reviews.Title: I'm a sucker
Reviews.Author: N. Blossom
Reviews.Content: I liked the camera but it broke after 14 mos. I take good care of my things, never dropped it or anything.The batttery out lasted the camera? I'm a sucker so I bought another,like I said I liked it.

Reviews.Title: Camera stopped functioning after only 1.5 years of very light usage
Reviews.Author: Russell Asklof
Reviews.Content: The camera functioned fine until April 2013 where after not being used for about 5 months the focus capabilities of the camera failed. The camera remains in a state of de-focus. the auto focus function is not working and the zoom functions have stopped working.The same problem was also noted in a similar model at the local Best Buy when I investigated other cameras as a quick replacement.

Reviews.Title: Gotten really cheap in quality
Reviews.Author: ME-4
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a replacement for a 7010 that was dropped (screen broke).  While the picture quality seems ok, this 7040 camera is not anywhere near the same quality as it's predicessor.  It feels very lightweight and "cheap".  Also, the software comes preloaded on the internal memory, and wouldn't install on my WinXP PC.  Fortunately, I still had the Olympus Master II program from the old camera so not a big deal.  In any case, I'd suggest that there are better options out there, including Canon and Nikon.  I would not recommend this camera.  Even for relatively inexpensive cameras, there are better choices.UPDATED after a year's use:  Piece of junk.  Quality went downhill fast, and software isn't even supported anymore.  Last Olympus I will buy.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after the first time I recharged it.
Reviews.Author: Lorie Conley
Reviews.Content: Used the camera once till the battery ran down.  It seemed to work fine.  Then I plugged it in to recharge it last night so that we could use it for a school event today.  The light came on indicating that it was charging.  When I got it off the charger this morning the light was out, so I thought that it was charged.  When I tried to turn it on, it would not come on.  I tried plugging it in a different outlet to see if something had been wrong with the one I used, nothing happened.  Then I tried charging it on the computer.  Still nothing.  So, I am not sure if it is actually the camera, the battery or the charger that is having problems.I had an older model of the Olympus Stylus that I really liked, so that is why I got this one.  I love the size, but did not get to use it enough to tell if I like anything else about it.  Once I get my refund I am going to try ordering another one to see if I have any better luck with it.  Hopefully it was just something about this one that was defective and not all of them.

Reviews.Title: broken in a two weeks
Reviews.Author: Elena
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and was very excited. I am on the trip now and camera after two weeks in use quite working. While it was working pictures were fine, but battery lasts only about 2-3 hours, you can make only about 50 pictures and have to recharge battery. It is very unconvinient.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Ale
Reviews.Content: This camara is very easy to use, take very nice pictures and easy to download ... I highly recommed it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: mak
Reviews.Content: SO far this is a great camera, we bought it to take on a vacation, and I have used it a little so far, and pictures are of great quality. The sellers were prompt in shipping the item, receved it on time.

Reviews.Title: Lens stuck Problem
Reviews.Author: walrus
Reviews.Content: Be caution! Olympus Stylus 70X0 series have lens stuck problem, the cover of the lens keep open and the optical zoom lens stuck open. In most cases, you could make the len back by gently knocking it. But not fun at all! Except that, I agree it's great for the price.

Reviews.Title: DISATISFIED
Reviews.Author: CRICKET
Reviews.Content: CAMERA WAS TOTALLY DEFECTIVE, SENT IT BACK FOR A REFUND. I HAVE HAD THIS CAMERA BEFORE AND I LIKE THE CAMERA, HOWEVER THIS ONE WAS DEFECTIVE UPON ARRIVAL. I WILL NOT BUY A CAMERA FROM THIS RETAILER AGAIN.[...]

Reviews.Title: Olympus
Reviews.Author: Corina Pena Gregori
Reviews.Content: I'm an Olympus fan, so this review cannot be interpreted as an objective one.I'v e been buying Olympus since college, ... for me.But, also I think of myself as objective generally speaking.Except on one occasion, this company has not let me down.The last purchase via Amazon, is no exception.Thank your.enrique
